name: Jump Rope Squirrel
description:
JUMP ROPE SQUIRREL

- CONTROLS -

SPACE - Jump

- INFORMATION -

A game by NPJarcade, written in just one hour for week 9 of the squirrel themed Weekly Hour Game Jam 2017.

- Jump the rope as many times as you can

- The trees will change the speed of the rope, so stay focused!

- CREDITS -

Follow me on Twitter @NPJarcade

Programming, artwork and graphics by NPJarcade, UK, 2017.

Audio randomly generated using ChipTone - http://sfbgames.com/chiptone
